MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 and CH8 postcode areas of Bagillt and Holywell, affecting properties in Rayon Road, Bala Avenue, Bagillt Road and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:09pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by 2 grounded overhead lines. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We now expect the power to be restored by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:40pm on 10th February 2021.
